gameDetails.name: Frisian Landscapes (fan expansion to Fields of Arle)
gameDetails.description:
New specific needs emerged, and the Arle community has great expectations on you. Will you carry out an intensive farming activity? Will you be the best builder? Will you be a good horse breeder? Craft your strategy following three common goals and find your way to success!

Fields of Arle: Frisian Landscapes is a Fields of Arle print-and-play expansion fully compatible with any other existing expansion of the base game.

The development of this expansion has taken place with the permission of the original publisher Feuerland Spiele.

—description from the designer
